summaries.title: The Temple and the Church's Mission
summaries.author: G. K. Beale
summaries.teaser: Most Christians would agree that there are difficult parts ...

summaries.title: Lit! A Christian Guide to Reading Books
summaries.author: Tony Reinke
summaries.teaser: The motto of the reading Christian is a dazzling doxology: 'In Your light we see light.' (Psalm 36:9)

summaries.title: Spurgeon's Sorrows
summaries.author: Zack Eswine
summaries.teaser: Might it surprise you to know that the 'Prince of Preachers' suffered from crippling depression?

summaries.title: Untangling Emotions
summaries.author: J. Alisdair Groves & Winston Smith
summaries.teaser: Our emotions are always pressuring us to act. This book will help you to identify, examine and evaluate your emotions before you do something you can't take back.

summaries.title: Job - The Wisdom Of The Cross
summaries.author: Christopher Ash
summaries.teaser: Job is a book about how God treats His friends.

summaries.title: Think Like a Rocket Scientist
summaries.author: Ozan Varol
summaries.teaser: You're not a rocket scientist, but sometimes life is that hard. Learn how to think like one.

summaries.title: The Gospel Comes With A House Key
summaries.author: Rosaria Butterfield
summaries.teaser: Radical Ordinary Hospitality is not a natural thing for a Christian to participate in.

summaries.title: Sharing a Meal with Jesus
summaries.author: Tim Chester
summaries.teaser: 'In Luke's Gospel Jesus got Himself killed because of the way He ate.'
